text: Micula (, Mîḵulāh) is a surname of Ashkenazi Jewish origin. It is most popular in Eastern Europe. The name dates back to the 11th century, many Jews moved to East Europe to avoid persecution. In some countries the name is written as Mikula, because of the Slavic influence. People with the surname Micula can be found in Poland, Russia, Romania, Slovakia, Israel, Slovenia, Czech Republic, Ukraine and Moldova. ==References== Category:Surnames
title: Micula (surname)
